Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista® C1IN Flex® reagent cartridge
Regulation Name(s): Complement C1 inhibitor (inactivator) immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista® C1IN Flex® reagent cartridge, CAL, and CON for quantitative measurement and control of C1 Inhibitor using immunochemical light scatter on the Dimension Vista® System.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of C1 inhibitor in human serum and plasma to aid in diagnosis of hereditary angioneurotic edema and angioedema associated with lymphoma; CAL for method calibration; CON for quality control assessment on the Dimension Vista® System.
